visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with a white background, no animation, and a legend positioned at the bottom.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart is set to have a white background and no animation. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally, with styled text. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing presentation of the monthly temperature data.
